import Mathlib

open Filter Asymptotics

/-!
Lemma (informal): Suppose f : â„^n â†’ â„ is differentiable at x0. Then
|f(x0+h) - f(x0) - Df(x0) h| â‰¤ â€–Df(x0)â€– â€–hâ€– + o(â€–hâ€–) as h â†’ 0.
This file gives a Lean statement of that inequality (ending with `by sorry`).
-/

lemma jirilebl_ra_ch_several_vars_ders_2621 {n : â„•} (f : (Fin n â†’ â„) â†’ â„) (x0 : Fin n â†’ â„) :
  DifferentiableAt â„ f x0 â†’
  Asymptotics.IsLittleO (ð“ (0 : Fin n â†’ â„))
    (fun h => (|f (x0 + h) - f x0 - fderiv â„ f x0 h| - â€–(fderiv â„ f x0)â€– * â€–hâ€–))
    (fun h => â€–hâ€–) := by sorry

import Mathlib

open Filter Asymptotics

/-!
Lemma (informal): Suppose f : â„^n â†’ â„ is differentiable at x0. Then
|f(x0+h) - f(x0) - Df(x0) h| â‰¤ â€–Df(x0)â€– â€–hâ€– + o(â€–hâ€–) as h â†’ 0.
This file gives a Lean statement of that inequality (ending with `by sorry`).
-/

lemma jirilebl_ra_ch_several_vars_ders_2621 {n : â„•} (f : (Fin n â†’ â„) â†’ â„) (x0 : Fin n â†’ â„) :
  DifferentiableAt â„ f x0 â†’
  Asymptotics.IsLittleO (nhds (0 : Fin n â†’ â„))
    (fun h => (|f (x0 + h) - f x0 - (fderiv â„ f x0) h| - â€–(fderiv â„ f x0)â€– * â€–hâ€–))
    (fun h => â€–hâ€–) := by sorry
